long_description: Keep your first-aid kit stocked up with this REI First-Aid Medications refill kit. Treat aches, pains and fevers with the Tylenol and Advil tablets; Nutralox antacid tablets help relieve heartburn, acid indigestion and upset stomach. Histaprin allergy relief caplets help relieve runny nose, sneezing and itching associated with hay fever. Use the Diamode caplet to treat symptoms of diarrhea. Electrotab electrolyte tablets contain sodium chloride, potassium chloride and calcium carbonate to help relieve heat stress and muscle cramps.
short_description: Keep your first-aid kit stocked up with this REI First-Aid Medications refill kit.
